Description:
This events that are generated when using the hacktool Ruler by Sensepost

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Hacktool Ruler
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where (((eventid = '4624' or eventid = '4625') and workstationname = 'ruler') or (eventid = '4776' and workstation = 'ruler'))
